page.title: 12Two Popular Hobbies
page.content:
{B.M.X. Bikes My hobby is riding my bike. I ride it every day. It is a Grifter but it has lots of B.M.X. gear on it. B.M.X stands for{Bicycle Motor X}, which is a very big sport in England and the U.S.A. The best B.M.Xers are{Huch}and {Haro.}These bikes are ridden by the top riders in the world. Huch bikes have about one thousand pounds worth of gear on them.
{Hacky Sack Hacky Sack is a revolutionary new sport which can be easily carried in a pocket.It is smaller than a tennis ball and it is full of tiny beads.The idea of it is that you try and keep it up off the ground with a variety of kicks but it is difficult because it does not bounce.
